|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192EU; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1246-01000151-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2782095 FCC photos]. {{see also|ASRock G10|ASRock X10R|Edimax}}
===Features=== *Detachable 2-in-1 dongle - travel access point (AP) :or an HDMI dongle with 2T2R 802.11n Wi-Fi (Miracast) * HDMI Miracast / EZplay & DLNA (1920x1080 output resolution) :Works with devices: Android / iOS smartphones and tablets
===Specifications=== *N300 Wi-Fi travel access point *Memory: 128MB Flash + 128MB RAM *One 10/100 Mbps Ethernet port *Two internal antennas *Supports Miracast/EZplay & DLNA :1920 x 1080 output resolution *Micro USB port for power adapters
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://www.asrock.com/news/index.asp?id=2801 ''ASRock G10 Press release'' on '''ASRock'''] *[http://www.tomshardware.com/news/asrock-router-mu-mimo-g10-networking,29287.html News on '''TomsHardware'''] *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/asrock-g10-router.27478/ ''ASRock G10'' on '''SNB''' forums]
===Reviews=== *[http://article.techlabs.by/51_35719.html ''ASRock G10 Router'' on '''TechLabs'''] :'''[[ASRock H2R HDMI Dongle]]''' (MFG OEM: [[Edimax]]) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2AFEB-H2R 2AFEB-H2R] (2015-10-13) ''HDMI 2-in-1 Router'' :*SoC: [[Actions Microelectronics]] AM8251 @600MHz MIPS :*Flash: 128MB ''Winbond'', RAM: 128MB ''Nanya'' :*WLAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8192EU (2T2R 802.11bgn USB 2.0) :*LAN: [[Micrel]] ''(Mindray)'' KSZ8081MNX FE (10/100 PHY)
